original_text: The cherubs stood at the south side of the temple when the man went in among them. A cloud filled the inside yard of the temple.
korean_text: 그 사람이 들어갈 때에 그룹들은 성전 오른쪽에 서 있고 구름은 안뜰에 가득하며

sentences.original_text: The cherubs stood at the south side of the temple
when the man went in among them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람이 그들 사이로 들어갈 때

sentences.original_text: A cloud filled the inside yard of the temple
